overview: Moriyoshi Matsmoto brings an extensive background of investment and operational knowledge to JAIC America, Inc. Mr. Matsumoto, a CMA (Chartered Member of the Security Analysts Association of Japan) joined JAIC at the corporate headquarters in Tokyo, Japan in 1989 and has been a member of the Board of Directors and Investment Committee since 2000. Additionally, Mr. Matsumoto serves as Managing Director and Chief Investment Officer of the fund for Private Equity Secondaries. He has vast experience in both Accounting and International Business and received a B.A. in Law from Keio University in Tokyo, Japan.
